    • Method Detail

      • getAuthHash

        public static CompletableFuture<String> getAuthHash​(String email,
                                                    String masterPassword)
        Returns the authentication hash for the given email address and password.

        To calculate the authentication hash, first, the vault key is is derived from the master password, using the email as the salt. Finally, the authentication hash is derived from the vault key as the key and the master password as the salt.

        Parameters:
        email - the email address.
        masterPassword - the master password.
        Returns:
        the authentication hash.

      • encrypt

        public static CompletableFuture<String> encrypt​(String data)
        Encrypt the given data with the vault key.
        Parameters:
        data - the data.
        Returns:
        the encrypted data.

      • decrypt

        public static CompletableFuture<String> decrypt​(String data)
        Decrypt the given data with the vault key.
        Parameters:
        data - the encrypted data.
        Returns:
        the data, decrypted.

      • generateKey

        private static CompletableFuture<SecretKey> generateKey​(String password,
                                                        String stringSalt,
                                                        int iterations)
        Generates a key for the given password and salt.
        Parameters:
        password - the password.
        stringSalt - the string used as a salt.
        Returns:
        the generated key.

      • getSalt

        private static byte[] getSalt​(int length)
                       throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Generates a salt of the given length.
        Parameters:
        length - the length of the salt.
        Returns:
        the generated salt.
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the random byte generator is not available.
